Title: Zombies
Plot: After a game of street hockey, Sean takes some sleeping pills believing they are painkillers and it has an unwanted consequence. In the meantime, Tommy and Angie decide to go on their fake date that they know will upset Janet. After having a close call, Lou gets a new angle on firefighting from his Uncle Red.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sex scenes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Jarret Sumers,  Michael Townsend Wright,  Taylor Dayne,  Marc Damon Johnson,  Luke Rosen,  Timothy Adams,  Anthony Alessandro,  Marisa Tomei
